body:
Hello

Barney, Ingi and I would like to present to you our new event - The All Star game. This has undergone minimal planning so far, but we believe this will run EVEN smoother than last week.

When?
  • The event will take place on the 26th of September at 7PM BST. This time was chosen so US people can play as well as EU!
  • We are looking for streamers to stream the match. If you would be interested in streaming, please contact me on Skype.
What is this event?

Two teams picked by the COMMUNITY will go head to head on Rendezvous 3 CTW! The time limit will be the server ending. 

Who is playing?

That's up to you guys to decide! If you can fill out this doc and READ EACH QUESTION VERY CAREFULLY. Questions could be answered with somebodys in game name, not something everybody might not know. Please vote for you feel has experience and is the most skilled, and not just your friend. All votes are anonymous so do not be biased and vote for friends or even teammates. The teams will be finalised and posted here on the 24th of September at about 9PM BST; votes will close at 8PM BST.

Teams? Hell yea, they're here boy.

Team 1 - Tazz, Robin, Pizza, Pope, Lego, Budah, Ingi, Raging, Danikas Emmaye

Team 2 - Barney, Piez, Zero, Ambi, Jive, Zew, Kiwi, Remy. Loo, Stimulating



Final Votes

Robin 37
Barney 37
Tazz 36
Robo 27 (can't make it)
Raging 24
Ingigo 23
Legoche 23
Jive 22
Danikas 22
Budah 22
Remy 22
Zero 18
Kiwi 17
Pope 17
Ambi 15
PieZ 15
Emmaye 12
Stimulating 12
Zew 12
Loo 12
Pizza 11 

20 HERE (21 I know, but Robo can't play.)

LG 11 (INACTIVE)
Pizza 11 
Creep 11
Jozz 10
Jiim 8
Zeus 8
Atdit 8


Thank you

The Unofficial Event Coordinators

replies.body: Also, can I just say, Barney and I are not stupid. We can tell when you have either got friends to vote for you voted for yourself numerous times. When you have 6 votes in the same position in 10 minutes, it's quite obviously not legit in one way shape or form.  Another example being where you have appear in 7 consecutive votes after only having 4. Just letting you know, if we feel like there has been duped/ unlegit votes they will not be counted and completely disregarded; you're just screwing yourself over.

replies.body:
Yes, but at the same time, my votes were removed and I was accused of voting myself in. If I wanted to vote myself in I'd just connect to different VPN servers every vote, I'm not dumb enough to not think things through if I was going to try and do that. Ambi is on vacation in Sweden and doesn't want to waste his limited internet time voting himself several times. 

There are pretty decent explainations

Tl;dr: there are explainations and not enough evidence to really accuse.
